title: dEvaki tanayuni
sahitya:
dEvaki tanayuni bAga sEvimparArE



anupallavi



 bhAvamutO shrI gOpAlakrSNuni bhakta mandAruni patita pAvanuni



caraNam

 gOpAlulu koluvakanu konumu gOvardhanamu patti bhUpAla dhama kamsa bhUpAluni

 goTTi pAmudau kALiyuni bhanjana cEsi bhagavAn shrI harikEsha bhakta hrdvilAsuni
